title: [Skin Suggestions] Mecha Gnar!!
body:
Mecha Gnar for a skin?! 1350 rp or 1820 rp tiers.

Not terribly original I know but sometimes it just simply sounds awesome and could work.

I haven't seen any LoL art do an interpretation of Mecha Gnar. So it's kind of unthought of?

If no new Gnar skin for a while I would settle for a default Gnar chroma pack. Yellow?, blue?, **and pink**. How could I forget black though. Or grey/white. I would use em all depending on my mood

replies.body: I want like pool party or surfer gnar... it would be gnarly

A tiny cute robot that explodes in a shower of gears to re-form into a giant kill-bot.
I like the idea.

Yes.

Makes me think of transformers. Although I never saw the movies or anything

One daytime bump for visibility, since I posted this at 3 am

Another decent Gnar skin concept. Viking or "Olaf" Gnar. Art for it. By an artist known as KrueltyKlown on deviant art. He seems to do a lot of good quality stuff, would be surprised if Riot was unawares.

http://krueltyklown.deviantart.com/art/GNAR-league-of-Legends-476769581.jpg[/img]

Problem with this one compared to mecha gnar is it's less clear what mega form is supposed to be. Just another monster I guess. So the skin is not too different overall; Gnar just gets some neat armor and an axe
